abilities.description:
Your mech is equipped with a reinforced ramming surface and a short-burst hyper-acceleration jet.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.3f5a834fa3fea5d1]{Gain Ground} by ramming a foe or obstacle at jet speed, you may roll +integrity. If you do, take +1 momentum on a hit. No matter the result, if the lowest challenge die is greater than your integrity, suffer -1 integrity.
